basics.label: Business Development
basics.summary: Detail-oriented professional with a business mindset and an extensive operational background obtained through diverse industry experience in banking, loss prevention, health and wellness, and retail offering innovative methods of efficiency meant to benefit individuals at all levels of business.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Identify areas of opportunity within the business to create solutions to increase efficiency and productivity. Monitor and report on website and ads traffic and performance.
highlights: Increased database ease of use and efficiency by 10%.
Developed, implemented, tested, debugged and documented various systems
Improved client relationships and performance predictability

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Establish and maintain all operational procedures and systems. Oversee all day-to-day operations.
highlights: Strategic budget planning by measuring and managing key operating metrics and sales KPI's.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintain the flow of information through the databases used. Problem solve whenever necessary by troubleshooting office systems.
highlights: Endorse and deploy various automations to increase efficiency and productivity by evaluating systems performance.
